statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_id = 1;
SELECT disease_name, affected_population FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT outbreak_date, region FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_population > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_outbreaks FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_id = 1 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_population > 1000 ORDER BY outbreak_id ASC
SELECT outbreak_id, region, COUNT(outbreak_id) AS num_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks GROUP BY region ORDER BY num_cases DESC
SELECT MAX(affected_population) AS max_population, AVG(affected_population) AS avg_population FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_name = 'Malaria'
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region = 'Africa' OR region = 'Asia' ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, confirmed_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM PopulationHealth WHERE health_condition='COVID-19' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_outbreaks FROM DiseaseOutbreaks GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT location, MAX(confirmed_cases) AS max_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks GROUP BY location;
SELECT patient_id, health_condition, age, gender FROM PopulationHealth ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, outbreak_date, location, confirmed_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE confirmed_cases > 100 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationHealth WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) as total_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks GROUP BY disease_name HAVING total_cases > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY location;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, outbreak_date, confirmed_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE confirmed_cases BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY outbreak_id;
SELECT * FROM outbreaks
SELECT disease_name, location FROM outbreaks
SELECT location, date FROM outbreaks ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, disease_name, location, date FROM outbreaks WHERE location='New York'
SELECT population, demographic_info FROM population_health
SELECT * FROM outbreaks
SELECT disease_name, location FROM outbreaks WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM outbreaks GROUP BY location
SELECT health_status, population FROM population_health WHERE population > 1000000
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM health_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM outbreak_reports;
SELECT disease_name, reported_date FROM outbreak_reports WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM outbreak_reports GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT location, MAX(reported_date) AS latest_report_date FROM outbreak_reports GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM disease_statistics WHERE total_cases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM outbreak_reports ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, total_cases FROM disease_statistics WHERE total_cases > 1000;
SELECT location, reported_by FROM outbreak_reports WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM health_agencies WHERE agency_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT city, population_size FROM population_health_data WHERE population_size > 50000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases;
SELECT city, country FROM locations;
SELECT patient_id, outbreak_id FROM patient_outbreak;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT DISTINCT city, country FROM locations ORDER BY country, city DESC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, d.disease_name, o.start_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN patient_outbreak po ON p.patient_id = po.patient_id INNER JOIN outbreaks o ON po.outbreak_id = o.outbreak_id INNER JOIN diseases d ON o.disease_id = d.disease_id WHERE o.end_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, country FROM patients GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY total_patients DESC, country ASC;
